phrases: That is my secret technique, the Sweets Canyon!
Sh-she let one box of candy slide so it would take down that whole mountain of them!
UMR stuck it to us again!
Her techniques are as Godlike as ever!
UMR, that was a fine play, indeed!
How about we go somewhere and eat these?
How about coming to my house?!
all I have seen is her living room and the study.
Sure, I would be glad to!
Huh... so this is your room, TSF?
If you keep eyeing it like that, you will make me embarrassed, indeed!
And look at those goods from Anumate!
She even put up the photos from when we went to the amusement park...
Being in a friend's room is fun because it brings back memories, huh?
Sbrite is the perfect accompaniment for snacks, UMR!
I like to watch anime while enjoying snacks and drinking Sbrite!
So, Sylphin has been having feasts of her own.
Actually, I am pretty particular about that sort of thing myself.
Why do not you show me how it is done?
Switching between chocolate and potato chips makes them extra delicious.
Indeed, I have never tried that!
So, Bamboo Shoot Mountains are the only ones you like?
Hmm... Bamboo Shoot Mountains are the best, but...
They are the standard when it comes to snacks.
They are just so crunchy and delicious!
I have heard that in Japan, friends will engage in a Pokee game!
Do you know what sort of game it is, UMR?
In that case, I would like to do it with you, this so-called Pokee game!
That is not a game that we would play.
I wish to do it with you, indeed!
The thing about the Pokee game, is, um...
You have to do it with someone who is really SPECIAL to you.
But I think of you as a MOST special friend, UMR!
I-I think the same of you, but there is NO WAY we are playing the Pokee game!
Sorry for raising my voice like that...
it is just, I do not think that is the kind of game that friends play with each other.
It is my fault for getting carried away at having a friend over.
it is nice having this big room and all, but I bet it is lonely having her snack feasts all by herself.
Really, I am the one who is sorry.
Um... you are a great friend, TSF!
For some reason, I am SUPER embarrassed!
Let us play the Pokee game!
They play the Pokee game even in anime.
I wonder what sort of game it is, indeed!
We each take one end, and then...
But, we are getting closer and closer!
YOU-um, so, that is why... we cannot do it, right?
S-sorry to put you out, Big Brother.
She really did come for bread day, Big Brother.
I am glad I made enough for the three of us.
Today, I have made curry and naan.
So, Hikari, Kanau knows you have been coming here, right?
Like I thought, she does not know...
It took longer than expected to wrap things up.
Note: Kanau mistakenly confuses the meaning of to get someone home, for the homophone to return something.
Note: Kanau mistakenly confuses the meaning of to get someone home, for the homophone to return something.
Hikari, is it possible you have been coming here without saying anything?
That would make your sister worry...
Say, Big Brother, why do not you call her?
Well, it IS more dangerous at night, and she is probably made dinner already...
My sister works overtime on Tuesdays.
I have just been eating on my own.
Well, we do not mind at all!
I will be working late tonight, but I have made dinner and put it in the fridge.
I have got to eat alone?
Well, fine, if there is no other option...
Hurry up or it will get cold.
You sure you do not need me to walk you home?
No, I am meeting someone, so I will be fine.
Is it all right if I come again?
Just do not make a habit of coming every week, yeah?
You went out tonight, did not you?!
I know you have been going out on Tuesdays when I work overtime!
I-I only went to get something to eat.
It is dangerous to be out this late, okay?!
I thought for sure you would object when Hikari said she wanted to come over again.
N-nah, I do not really mind...
UMR, did not this used to be a beauty shop?
TSF, had you been here before?
But it had an old-timey feel, and I liked it, indeed!
It is indeed a shame when a shop you like goes away...
You do like retro-style buildings, do not you?
Still, you sure know a lot about old-school department stores and candy shops,
even though you lived in Germany.
You have got the same kind of stuff in Germany?
But I would been to Japan once before.
When I was six, I made quite the fuss until I was brought here for some sightseeing!
Making such a fuss that they brought her from Germany here to Japan is pretty impressive...
And when I came, I saw an old arcade with a beautiful lake and a giant swan.
It is a wonderful memory, one that I have kept to this day.
Well, do you want to head out there today?
I do not remember where it is, and I doubt it exists anymore.
I think it is probably that mecca for retro gamers.
If the scenery has changed from how I remember it...
I think it would be a bit of a shock.
Staying the same is what makes the mecca a mecca.
Sagamiko Park has not changed a bit.
Even the signs are the same!
It is the same store employee!
Indeed, even that is the same as back then!
The Swan Boat is going to leave!
TSF, there is a rare game over here that I have never seen before!
It looks like most of the people on those boats are couples.
Sylph, why do not you want to leave?
Because after today, we will go back to Germany!
And I... I will not be able to see Big Brother anymore!
She has not said a word since I mentioned couples...
UMR, let us ride one of those boats!
THAT IS where this conversation led to?
This is the first time I have been on a boat.
You are my all-knowing hero, UMR.
I only knew about the Sagamiko arcade because it is famous.
Thank you so much for coming for me!
Do not you mean, Thank you for BRINGING me?
I think it is perfectly fitting, indeed!
It is been a while, indeed!
There sure is a lot we have to know this time...
I think I am going to fail tomorrow's tests...
I might not even make it to the next grade!
What did you mean, you will not make it to the next grade?
B-but this is the day before exams!
The timing just did not feel right.
I hope I pass along with the rest of you, but maybe I...
If that is what is at stake here, then this where I come in!
We shall hold a study group, indeed!
There is a wealth of books here, and the silence most certainly lends itself to study!
I have never even been in here...
I am thrilled at the idea of having a study session with you all!
Um, I do not think this is the right time to feel thrilled.
Ebina, what would you say are your weakest subjects?
Well, let us just see how things go.
You have a pretty decent grasp of this.
This will be enough to get you about an 80.
Ebina, I think you have performance anxiety.
That time before when we studied together, you did just fine...
But later, when we took the test, it looked like you did not do so well.
Everyone gets so serious when we are taking tests... it is like a totally different classroom!
It is as if I am the only one who gets left behind by the flow of time...
Reckon things could go wrong at the drop of a hat, and I would just want to up and go back to Akita!
Th-that must mean some seriously bad grades!
S-so then, so long as you are not nervous, you should be able to get a passing grade, right?
Yeah, but... what should we do?
I personally think of people as vegetables or something and purge them from my mind.
You know, you may be able to relax if you think about something you like.
Th-th-that might make me worry even MORE!
Still, this is sort of vexing.
The test is tomorrow, but we have not found a way to solve things.
You all have your own studying to do, but you are taking the time to help ME...
I am just dragging you all down.
I-in any case, right now we need less tears and more ideas!
We are sure to find a sound solution if we put our heads together.
It is only natural, would not you say?
Okay, let us start memorizing, Ebina!
Sylphin, that is not the subject for tomorrow's test.
My first day at a new school...
So, you are from the Midwest?
It is nice to meet you!
Those girls over there've already made friends!
Reckon I got to talk to someone!
Maybe I will try talking to her.
That Motoba girl kind of lost it at the entrance ceremony, huh?
They say she kicked some guy, a grownup!
Maybe I will try inviting her out for lunch sometime.
It is a pleasure to meet you all!
My name is Sylphinford Tachibana, and I shall become the greatest player in this classroom, indeed!
Sh-she is... like... outta some magazine!
I think I will be able to talk to her, though.
YOU-um, it is nice to meet you.
That is a rather unusual name.
You are quite courageous to be the first one to come talk to me.
Yes, at whatever you would say you are best at.
Maybe challenges like this are normal in Tokyo.
As for what I am best at...
I am no good at studying, though I am not bad at cooking and household chores...
Still, I cannot do those now.
I can eat a lot of akitakomachi rice!
But we do not have any akitakomoachi...
Reckon she is like a princess and all!
I heard you took the top spot in the entrance exams.
Um, I do not know if I was at the top or not...
You will now challenge me, please!
Wonder if maybe one day me and these girls can be friends...
It looked like you were spacing out.
It is because Sylphin keeps acting all weird.
So now I am the because?
I want to be with my friends!
Ebina, let us go home together.
Kirie, I will race you to that utility pole over there!
Wh-why would I want to do something like that?
Because seeing who comes first would be a challenge indeed!
H-how about we all go eat some crepes or something?
Thank you for being so welcoming with my sister Hikari.
We have yet to spend any proper time together yet, have we?
M-maybe we can go have tea or something.
